Detailed Description

Redefines supported socket flags for every supported platforms.

enum XFCSOCKETFLAGS
 

Enumeration values:
XFCNET_SOCKSTREAM  socket type
XFCNET_SOCKDGRAM 
XFCNET_AFINET 
XFCNET_AFBT 
XFCNET_FIONBIO  ioctl commands the nonblocking mode of socket
XFCNET_FIONREAD  Use to determine the amount of data pending in the network's input buffer that can be read from socket.
XFCNET_SOLSOCKET  setsockopt/getsockopt level values socket level
XFCNET_IPPROTOTCP 
XFCNET_IPPROTOUDP 
XFCNET_IPPROTOIP
